properties.description: Runs pipelines to copy files from file share, then process them into SQL tables.
Copies the Parquet files from the Azure file share to Azure blob storage. Then copies data from the files and loads into the TRANSFROM_DB. Everyday at 3pm

properties.description: Exports the DD report for the 3 homes that bank with Barclays. Saves to container which is monitored by a logic app, which will save to share point.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
	FundSrc_Hd.AccNo,
    Resident.Res_Code,
    Contact_Hd_Res.Forenames,
    Contact_Hd_Res.Surname,
    Locations.Loc_Desc,
    Locations.CostCentre,
    CASE
        WHEN DirectD_Dt.BankAcc != '' THEN
            DirectD_Dt.BankAcc
        ELSE
            FundSrc_Hd.BankAcc
    END AS BankAcc,
    CASE
        WHEN DirectD_Dt.BnkAccName != '' THEN
            DirectD_Dt.BnkAccName
        ELSE
            FundSrc_Hd.BnkAccName
    END AS BnkAccName,
    CASE
        WHEN DirectD_Dt.BkSortCode != '' THEN
            DirectD_Dt.BkSortCode
        ELSE
            isnull(Contact_Hd_FS.BkSortCode, space(8))
    END AS BkSortCode,
    DirectD_Dt.DDTranType,
    isnull(DirectD_Dt.Due_Date, DirectD_Dt.Inv_Date) AS Due_Date,
    DirectD_Dt.Submitted,
    DirectD_Dt.Allocated,
    DirectD_Hd.BatchNo,
    Site.SiteId,
    Site.SiteName,
    DirectD_Dt.Amount
FROM 
	DirectD_Dt (NOLOCK)
    JOIN DirectD_Hd (NOLOCK)
        ON DirectD_Hd.DDHd_Ref = DirectD_Dt.DDHd_Ref
           AND DirectD_Hd.BatchNo
           BETWEEN 0 AND 9999999999
    JOIN FundSrc_Hd (NOLOCK)
        LEFT JOIN Contact_Dt AS Contact_Dt_FS (NOLOCK)
            JOIN Contact_Hd AS Contact_Hd_FS (NOLOCK)
                ON Contact_Hd_FS.Contact_Ref = Contact_Dt_FS.Contact_Ref
            ON Contact_Dt_FS.Cnta_Det_Ref = FundSrc_Hd.Bank_Det_Ref
        JOIN Resident (NOLOCK)
            JOIN Contact_Dt AS Contact_Dt_Res (NOLOCK)
                JOIN Contact_Hd AS Contact_Hd_Res (NOLOCK)
                    ON Contact_Hd_Res.Contact_Ref = Contact_Dt_Res.Contact_Ref
                ON Contact_Dt_Res.Cnta_Det_Ref = Resident.Cnta_Det_Ref
            JOIN Room_Dt (NOLOCK)
                JOIN Locations (NOLOCK)
                    JOIN Site (NOLOCK)
                        ON Site.Site_Ref = Locations.Site_Ref
                    ON Locations.Loc_Ref = Room_Dt.Loc_Ref
                ON Room_Dt.Room_Ref = Resident.Room_Ref
            ON Resident.Res_Ref = FundSrc_Hd.Res_Ref
        ON FundSrc_Hd.FS_Ref = DirectD_Dt.FS_Ref
WHERE 
	DirectD_Dt.Due_Date
    BETWEEN '17530101' AND '29991231'
    --AND DirectD_Dt.Allocated != 'X'
    and DirectD_Dt.Submitted IS NULL
    and DirectD_Dt.DDTranType IN ( '01', '17', '18', '19' )
    AND Locations.Site_Ref = @{item().Site_ref}

properties.description: Refreshes the GRG ACCOUNT data in TRANSFORM_DB

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT [ACCNO]
      ,[ACCSUFFIX]
      ,[ACCTYPE]
      ,[ACCTYPE2]
      ,[ACCTYPE_DECODE]
      ,[ACC_REF]
      ,[AmendDateTime]
      ,[CALENDAR]
      ,[CAL_REF]
      ,[CHGPER]
      ,[Cnta_Det_Ref]
      ,[Cont_Ref]
      ,[CreateDateTime]
      ,[DAILYRATE]
      ,[ENDDATE]
      ,[FINALINV]
      ,[FS_REF]
      ,[FUNDSOURCE]
      ,[HOME_REF]
      ,[LASTRATEDT]
      ,[ORIGREF]
      ,[PENSBOOK]
      ,[PROFILE]
      ,[RATE]
      ,[RECGRP]
      ,[RECGRPDESC]
      ,[RELACCREF]
      ,[RES_REF]
      ,[RecType]
      ,[STARTDATE]
      ,[SUFFIXSUPERCEDED]
      ,[ANAL3]
      ,[ATTENTION]
      ,[AUTHORISED]
      ,[CONSULTANT]
      ,[CRCONTROL]
      ,[DEBTORCODE]
      ,[FUNDREQEDI]
      ,[FURC_DEC]
      ,[INPFUNDAPR]
      ,[LOCALITY]
      ,[NURFUNDAPR]
      ,[RECONCILED]
      ,'' AS [BANKACC]
      ,'' AS [BANKACCNAME]
      ,'' AS [BANKADDRESS1]
      ,'' AS [BANKADDRESS2]
      ,'' AS [BANKADDRESS3]
      ,'' AS [BANKADDRESS4]
      ,'' AS [BANKNAME]
      ,'' AS [BANKPOSTCODE]
      ,'' AS [BANKSORTCODE]
      ,[BANKSTREF]
      ,[BANKTRTYPE]
      ,[DDMANDREF]
      ,[SOCOLDAY]
      ,[SOCOLLECT]
      ,[SOVALUE]
      ,[USAGE]
      ,[CALCODE]
      ,[PCTDESC]
      ,[REVDATE]
  FROM [AHC_GRG_FBWIN].[dbo].[ACCOUNT] AS A
   WHERE
	A.HOME_REF IN   (@{variables('HOME_REF_LIST')})
ORDER BY
	ACC_REF ASC

SELECT  
	[ACTDEATHDT]
	,[ADANAL_DEC]
	,[ADTYP_DEC]
	,[AD_REF]
	,[AmendDateTime]
	,[CAUSE]
	,[CAUSEDEATH]
	,[CreateDateTime]
	,[DATE]
	,[DISCHDECEAS]
	,[DISDEST]
	,[DISREASON]
	,[DISTYPE]
	,[DOCTOR]
	,[FINALDISCH]
	,[HOME_REF]
	,[INITIALADM]
	,[INOUT]
	,[LOC_REF]
	,[MOVE_REF]
	,[PLACE]
	,[REASON]
	,[RES_REF]
	,[ROOM]
	,[ROOM_TYPE]
	,[TIME]
	,[MOVE_TIME]
	,[ANALCHANGE]
	,[COMPOSITE]
	,[MOVESUB_REF]
	,[PREVDISDEST]
	,[PREVDISTYPE]
FROM 
	[AHC_GRG_FBWIN].[dbo].[ADMIN_DISCHARGE] AS M
WHERE
	M.HOME_REF IN (@{variables('HOME_REF_LIST')})
ORDER BY 
	AD_REF ASC

properties.description: Copies the resident diary entries from CH to AH2 Transform

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	Resident_Dy.RES_DY_REF,
	Resident_Dy.RES_REF,
	R.RES_CODE,
    ChSysDec.Description AS EntryType,
    CAST(Resident_Dy.Entry_Date AS DATE) AS EntryDate,
	CAST(Resident_Dy.Review_Date AS DATE) AS ReviewDate,
    replace(cast(Resident_Dy.Entry_Text as varchar(MAX)), char(13) + char(10), ' ') AS DiaryEntry,
    isnull(User_Hd.Name, '') AS EnteredBy
FROM 
    Resident_Dy (NOLOCK)
    
    LEFT JOIN Chsysdec (NOLOCK)
        ON Chsysdec.Decode_Ref = Resident_Dy.Entry_Type
        
    LEFT JOIN User_Hd (NOLOCK)
        ON User_Hd.User_Ref = Resident_Dy.User_Ref

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT AS R (NOLOCK)
		ON R.RES_REF = Resident_Dy.RES_REF

properties.description: Home IDs for CH IP and GRG

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT HOME_ID, HOME_NAME, HOME_REF FROM dbo.HOME
ORDER BY 1 ASC

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
[ADANAL_DEC]
      ,[ADDRESS1]
      ,[ADDRESS2]
      ,[ADDRESS3]
      ,[ADDRESS4]
      ,[ADMSN_ANAL]
      ,[ADMSN_TYPE]
      ,[ADM_REASON]
      ,[ADTYP_DEC]
      ,[ANAL_GROUP]
      ,[AUTHORITY]
      ,R.[AmendDateTime]
      ,[BIRTHDATE]
      ,[CARECAT]
      ,[CONTSIGNED]
      ,R.[CreateDateTime]
      ,[DISABILITY]
      ,[ENQ_REF]
      ,[HOME]
      ,R.[HOME_REF]
      ,[LASTADDATE]
      ,[LASTDIDATE]
      ,[LOC_DESC]
      ,[LOC_REF]
      ,[MARKETING]
      ,[NINUMBER]
      ,[OCC_IGNORE]
      ,[ORES_REF]
      ,[ORIGADDATE]
      ,[POSTCODE]
      ,[RELIGION]
      ,[RESPAYINT]
      ,[RES_CODE]
      ,[RES_FNAME]
      ,[RES_REF]
      ,[RES_SNAME]
      ,[ROOM]
      ,[ROOMCAT]
      ,[ROOM_DESC]
      ,[ROOM_TYPE]
      ,[SEX]
      ,[STATUS]
      ,[TEL_NO1]
      ,[TEL_NO2]
      ,[TITLE]
      ,[USERDEF]
      ,[AUTHCODE]
      ,[DOUBLEINS]
      ,[FIRSTAWARE]
      ,[FIRSTVISIT]
      ,[REAL_FNAME]
      ,[REAL_SNAME]
      ,[REAL_TITLE]
      ,[SIGIND]
      ,[THIRDPARTY]
      ,[USERFIELD1]
      ,[USERFIELD2]
      ,[USERFIELD3]
      ,[NHSNUMBER]
      ,[ALTCOMMS]
      ,[ALTCOMMS_REF]
      ,[ASS_ACTBY]
      ,[ASS_ACTBY_REF]
      ,[ASS_ACTDT]
      ,[CONNECTION]
      ,[CONNECTIONDET]
      ,[CONNECTION_REF]
      ,[FUNDERREF]
      ,[LANGUAGE]
      ,[LANGUAGE_REF]
      ,[MOVEDINFROM]
      ,[MOVEDINFROM_REF]
      ,[PATIENTREF]
      ,[PICID]
      ,[PREVCODE]
  FROM [AHC_GRG_FBWIN].[dbo].[RESIDENT] AS R

  WHERE
	R.HOME_REF IN (@{variables('HOME_REF_LIST')}) --Home_ref List of homes being used in CH. Excludes any old ones being brought in
    AND RES_CODE NOT IN ('HH0048', 'HH0051', 'HH0055', 'HH0060', 'HH0063', 'HH0064', 'HH0066') --Orphaned records in GRG for residents not present in CH
  ORDER BY
	  R.RES_REF ASC

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  
	R.[AmendDateTime]
    ,R.[CreateDateTime]
    ,R.[HOME_REF]
    ,R.[OLOC_REF]
    ,[OROOM_REF]
    ,[ROOM_CAT]
    ,[ROOM_CAT_DESC]
    ,[ROOM_CODE]
    ,[ROOM_DESC]
    ,[ROOM_NO_BEDS]
    ,[ROOM_REF]
    ,[ROOM_TYPE]
    ,[ROOM_TYPE_DESC]
    ,[CHARGEPERIOD]
    ,[CURRENTRATE]
    ,[RATEDATE]
    ,[ROOM_UDF1]
    ,[ROOM_UDF2]
    ,[ROOM_UDF3]
    ,[ROOM_UDF4]
    ,R.[USEFLAG]
FROM 
	[AHC_GRG_FBWIN].[dbo].[ROOMS] AS R
WHERE
	--R.AmendDateTime >= '2020-01-01'
	R.HOME_REF IN (@{variables('HOME_REF_LIST')})
ORDER BY 
	ROOM_REF ASC

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,Cont_SubType
    ,Cont_SubTypeDec
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,Forenames
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Gen_Comments
    ,PostCode
    ,RelType
    ,RelTypeDec
    ,Res_Ref
    ,Surname
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,TitleDec
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,Email
    ,LASTUPDATE
FROM 
    dbo.RESCONTACTS
WHERE
    Res_Ref IN (SELECT ORES_REF FROM RESIDENT WHERE HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')}))

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(RES_FNAME, 1, CHARINDEX(' ', RES_FNAME + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT	 
	'@{variables('Home_Ref')}' AS HOME_REF,
	Site.SiteId AS siteid,
	Site.SiteName as sitename, 
	RESIDENT.RES_CODE as resident_no,
	InvPosting.account_No, 
	InvPosting.Cre_DateT AS created_date, 
	InvPosting.Inv_Date AS transaction_date,
	CASE 
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'U' THEN 'Receipt'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'I' THEN 'Invoice'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'C' THEN 'Credit'
		WHEN InvPosting.Tran_Type = 'J' THEN 'Adjustment'
		ELSE ''
	END AS transaction_type,
	InvPosting.Ref1 AS transaction_ref1, 
	InvPosting.Ref2 AS transaction_ref2, 
	InvPosting.Value AS transaction_value, 
	InvPosting.Balance AS transaction_balance, 
	Memo,
	USERCOMM AS UserComment
FROM		 
	InvPosting (NOLOCK) 
	
	JOIN Site (NOLOCK) 
		ON Site.Site_Ref = InvPosting.Site_Ref

	LEFT JOIN RESIDENT (NOLOCK)
		ON RESIDENT.RES_REF = INVPOSTING.RES_REF
WHERE	
	InvPosting.Site_Ref  = '@{item().SITE_REF}'

SELECT HOME_REF, HomeName, SITE_REF 
FROM ColdHarbourHomeID 
WHERE SITE_REF = '@{item().SITE_REF}'

SELECT SITE_REF FROM ColdHarbourHomeID WHERE 
HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_ref_List')})

properties.description: Extracts data Yardi require to single csv files for multiple homes

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    AmendDateTime,
    CreateDateTime,
    HOME_REF,
    OLOC_REF,
    OROOM_REF,
    ROOM_CAT,
    ROOM_CAT_DESC,
    ROOM_CODE,
    ROOM_DESC,
    ROOM_NO_BEDS,
    ROOM_REF,
    ROOM_TYPE,
    ROOM_TYPE_DESC,
    CHARGEPERIOD,
    CURRENTRATE,
    RATEDATE,
    ROOM_UDF1,
    ROOM_UDF2,
    ROOM_UDF3,
    ROOM_UDF4,
    USEFLAG
FROM 
    dbo.ROOMS
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
    ,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN CHARINDEX(' and ', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME LIKE ' %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN LTRIM(RES_FNAME)
        WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) LIKE '% %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(LTRIM(RES_FNAME), 1, CHARINDEX(' ', LTRIM(RES_FNAME) + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,CASE 
        WHEN LTRIM(RES_SNAME) = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
        ELSE LTRIM(RES_SNAME)
    END AS RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,Cont_SubType
    ,Cont_SubTypeDec
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(LTRIM(Forenames), '.', ''), ',', ''), '*', ''), '|', ''), '?', '') AS Forenames
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Gen_Comments
    ,PostCode
    ,RelType
    ,RelTypeDec
    ,Res_Ref
    ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(LTRIM(Surname), '.', ''), ',', ''), '*', ''), '|', ''), '?', ''), ';', '') AS Surname
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,TitleDec
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,Email
    ,LASTUPDATE
FROM 
    dbo.RESCONTACTS
WHERE
    Res_Ref IN (SELECT ORES_REF FROM RESIDENT WHERE HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')}))

SELECT 
    ACTDEATHDT
    ,ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,AD_REF
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CAUSE
    ,CAUSEDEATH
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DATE
    ,DISCHDECEAS
    ,DISDEST
    ,DISREASON
    ,DISTYPE
    ,DOCTOR
    ,FINALDISCH
    ,HOME_REF
    ,INITIALADM
    ,INOUT
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MOVE_REF
    ,PLACE
    ,REASON
    ,RES_REF
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,TIME
    ,MOVE_TIME
    ,ANALCHANGE
    ,COMPOSITE
    ,MOVESUB_REF
    ,PREVDISDEST
    ,PREVDISTYPE
FROM 
    dbo.ADMIN_DISCHARGE
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT
    ACCNO
    ,ACCSUFFIX
    ,ACCTYPE
    ,ACCTYPE2
    ,ACCTYPE_DECODE
    ,ACC_REF
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CALENDAR
    ,CAL_REF
    ,CHGPER
    ,Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Cont_Ref
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DAILYRATE
    ,ENDDATE
    ,FINALINV
    ,FS_REF
    ,FUNDSOURCE
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTRATEDT
    ,ORIGREF
    ,PENSBOOK
    ,PROFILE
    ,RATE
    ,RECGRP
    ,RECGRPDESC
    ,RELACCREF
    ,RES_REF
    ,RecType
    ,STARTDATE
    ,SUFFIXSUPERCEDED
    ,ANAL3
    ,ATTENTION
    ,AUTHORISED
    ,CONSULTANT
    ,CRCONTROL
    ,DEBTORCODE
    ,FUNDREQEDI
    ,FURC_DEC
    ,INPFUNDAPR
    ,LOCALITY
    ,NURFUNDAPR
    ,RECONCILED
    ,BANKACC
    ,BANKACCNAME
    ,BANKADDRESS1
    ,BANKADDRESS2
    ,BANKADDRESS3
    ,BANKADDRESS4
    ,BANKNAME
    ,BANKPOSTCODE
    ,BANKSORTCODE
    ,BANKSTREF
    ,BANKTRTYPE
    ,DDMANDREF
    ,SOCOLDAY
    ,SOCOLLECT
    ,SOVALUE
    ,USAGE
    ,CALCODE
    ,PCTDESC
    ,REVDATE
FROM 
    ACCOUNT 
WHERE
    HOME_REF IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

SELECT 
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,EMAIL

WHERE
    GRGApp_GrGsRef IN (@{variables('Home_Ref_List')})

properties.description: Extracts data Yardi require to csv files for a single home

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    AmendDateTime,
    CreateDateTime,
    HOME_REF,
    OLOC_REF,
    OROOM_REF,
    ROOM_CAT,
    ROOM_CAT_DESC,
    ROOM_CODE,
    ROOM_DESC,
    ROOM_NO_BEDS,
    ROOM_REF,
    ROOM_TYPE,
    ROOM_TYPE_DESC,
    CHARGEPERIOD,
    CURRENTRATE,
    RATEDATE,
    ROOM_UDF1,
    ROOM_UDF2,
    ROOM_UDF3,
    ROOM_UDF4,
    USEFLAG
FROM 
    dbo.ROOMS
WHERE
    HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'
SELECT TOP 1 HomeName FROM Avery.HOME WHERE ColdHarbourHOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
    ,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN CHARINDEX(' and ', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME LIKE ' %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN LTRIM(RES_FNAME)
        WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) LIKE '% %' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(RES_FNAME)) NOT LIKE '%[("'']%' THEN RES_FNAME
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(LTRIM(RES_FNAME), 1, CHARINDEX(' ', LTRIM(RES_FNAME) + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,CASE 
        WHEN LTRIM(RES_SNAME) = '.' THEN ''
        WHEN RES_FNAME = '*' THEN ''
        ELSE LTRIM(RES_SNAME)
    END AS RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

SELECT
    Address1
    ,Address2
    ,Address3
    ,Address4
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,Cont_SubType
    ,Cont_SubTypeDec
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(LTRIM(Forenames), '.', ''), ',', ''), '*', '') AS Forenames
    ,GRGApp_GrGsRef
    ,GRGrep_Cnta_Det_Ref
    ,Gen_Comments
    ,PostCode
    ,RelType
    ,RelTypeDec
    ,Res_Ref
    ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(LTRIM(Surname), '.', ''), ',', ''), '*', '') AS Surname
    ,Tel_No1
    ,Tel_No2
    ,TitleDec
    ,oCnta_Det_Ref
    ,Email
    ,LASTUPDATE
FROM 
    dbo.RESCONTACTS
WHERE
    Res_Ref IN (SELECT ORES_REF FROM RESIDENT WHERE HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}')

    ACTDEATHDT
